Contributor: Dadd, Frank, 1851-1929, artist.; Straker Brothers, printer.; Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee, publisher.;
Note: Signed "Frank Dadd." "Poster No. 63(?)." "W TW.16178" appears on bottom left of the poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: A white-bearded veteran shakes the hand of a soldier in uniform. In the background, civilian recruits walk along behind a non-commissioned officer(?).
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Series: Poster (Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee) ; no. 63.
